message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and simple!
You can have less, I'm the one who's patient!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much!
You're not giving up enough, Alice! I'm willing to make a serious offer!
I'm not giving up much more, Bob. This is my final offer!
You're not taking this seriously, Alice. I'll take the majority and leave you with a small fraction!
I'm taking control now. This is my last offer!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take almost everything, and leave you with a tiny fraction!
I'm taking everything, Bob. This is my final, final offer!
I'll take it all. It's mine now!
